Package view

Class ConsoleView

java.lang.Object
view.ConsoleView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class ConsoleView extends Object implements View
A class that implements the View interface and provides a console-based user interface for the City Library application.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConsoleView

      public ConsoleView()
      Constructs a new instance of the ConsoleView class. Initializes the scanner, writer, and messages fields.

  • Method Details

    • setLocaleFromProperties

      public void setLocaleFromProperties()
      Reads the language setting from the config.properties file and sets the messages field accordingly. If the file cannot be read, displays an error message.
      Specified by:
      setLocaleFromProperties in interface View
